caption.p: Cyclic voltammograms recorded at a glassy carbon electrode ([U(VI)] = 100 mM, scan rate = 100 mV s −1, T = 373 K) of ( A) [bmim][NTf 2] (----) and U(VI) in [bmim][NTf 2] (—); and ( B) U(VI) in [bmim][NTf 2], in TBP/[bmim][NTf 2] and in TOP/[bmim][NTf 2].
